parameters.name: All
parameters.description: Specifies whether to delete all parts. Default value: **false** . This parameter is valid only when **TagKeys** is not specified.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The resource list that you want to delete.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Fixed to **INSTANCE** .

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The list of tags that you want to delete. The list can contain up to 20 subitems.
